nodes.text: Mot Worrom was a customer of the Star Tours travel agency around the time of an Imperial raid at Spaceport THX1138. A public address announcer paged Morrow in the terminal of the space station shortly before the raid, asking the passenger to pick up a courtesy comlink.

This name is a reference to a similar announcement made in the original Star Tours, for Mister Tom Morrow, only with that names spelled backwards. That original announcement was a reference to a number of Disney theme park attractions.
